# The `MachineFunctionPass` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunctionpass">MachineFunctionPass</a> - This class adapts the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionpass">FunctionPass</a> interface to allow convenient creation of passes that operate on the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> representation. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::MachineFunctionPass</CodeBlock>

  isLocal="true" />
</IncludesList>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunctionpass">MachineFunctionPass</a> - This class adapts the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionpass">FunctionPass</a> interface to allow convenient creation of passes that operate on the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> representation.

Instead of overriding runOnFunction, subclasses override runOnMachineFunction.

Definition at line 30 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinefunctionpass-h">MachineFunctionPass.h</a>.

For MachineFunctionPasses, calling AU.preservesCFG() indicates that the pass does not modify the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> CFG.
